changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS users ( id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY, first_name VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, last_name VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, login VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL UNIQUE, password VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL NOT NULL CHECK (balance >= 0), created_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL, deleted_at TIMESTAMPTZ, updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ, );
